approval_data.project_summary: This project is a simple web application to manage a list of tasks

requirements.title: Create Task Functionality
requirements.description: The system shall allow a user to create a new task. The user must be able to input a text description for the task. The system should store this description.

requirements.title: View Task List Functionality
requirements.description: The system shall display a list of all tasks created by the user. Each task in the list should display its text description.

requirements.title: Task Description Length Validation
requirements.description: The system should validate the length of the task description to prevent excessively long or short descriptions.  A reasonable character limit should be enforced.

requirements.title: A user can create a new task with a text descripti
requirements.description: A user can create a new task with a text description.

requirements.title: A user can see a list of all created tasks.
requirements.description: A user can see a list of all created tasks.
